title: The Registered Developer, who has been appointed by S
clause_text: The Registered Developer, who has been appointed by S.R.A. through competitive bid to develop a particular scheme/s, shall submit the scheme which may be accepted by the C.E.O.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The Registered Developer, who has been appointed by S.R.A. through competitive bid to develop a particular scheme/s, shall submit the scheme which may be accepted by the C.E.O.
